member.name: M:Dev.Data.ContextStorage.SimpleDbContextStorage.GetAllDbContexts
member.summary: Returns all the values of the internal dictionary of db contexts.

member.name: M:Dev.Data.ContextStorage.SimpleDbContextStorage.GetDbContextForKey(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the db context associated with the specified key or null if the specified key is not found.

member.name: M:Dev.Data.ContextStorage.SimpleDbContextStorage.SetDbContextForKey(System.String,System.Data.Entity.DbContext)
member.summary: Stores the db context into a dictionary using the specified key. If an object context already exists by the specified key, it gets overwritten by the new object context passed in.
